actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution authorizing Richard J. Asplund, an employee in the office of Senator Culver, to give testimony in the case of State of Iowa ex rel. Richard Turner v. Planning Research Corporation et al.

summary.text: Authorizes Richard J. Asplund, an employee in the office of Senator Culver, to appear and testify in the case of the State of Iowa ex rel. Richard Turner V. Planning Research Corporation et al.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing Richard J. Asplund, an employee in the office of Senator Culver, to give testimony in the case of State of Iowa ex rel. Richard Turner v. Planning Research Corporation et al.
